result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dawan Hykeem Holman

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman in court, in custody.  Attorney Angel L Johnson in court for Dawan Hykeem Holman.  Attorney Amanda Korin Kirklewski in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a final pre-trial.  Matter remains in trial posture.  No outstanding motions or issues raised by the parties.  Jury Trial remains calendared on November 7, 2022 at 9:00 AM for first call.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Received and Filed: State's Proposed Jury Instructions
Received and Filed: State's Motion in Limine

Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman not in court, in custody, appearance waived.  Attorney Angel L Johnson appeared by video for Dawan Hykeem Holman.  Prosecuting attorney Amanda Korin Kirklewski in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has filed a prompt disposition. Case is adjourned in Branch 02.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman in court, appear by video with attorney Michael J Cerniglia, appear by video.  Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took Judical Notice to case 18CF3419. Sworn for the State: MPD Officer M. Bennett.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman not in court, defendant in custody.  Edward OBrien appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Attorney Cerniglia is in line for trial and also has a sentencing; unable to appear for this matter. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Atty contacted the court after the case was called and is in trial.

Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman not in court, defendant in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Attorney Michael Cerniglia fail to appear. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with APA, TLA
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman in court with attorney Michael J Cerniglia.  Defendant Dawan Hykeem Holman in custody.  Sara Beth Hill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
